meaningMnemonic: Remember how 一昨日 means "day before last"? Similarly, <kanji>one</kanji> year <kanji>previous</kanji> to that <kanji>year</kanji> is the <vocabulary>year before last</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The last time you tossed something into a trash can was the <vocabulary>year before last</vocabulary>. Why? Because you got a trash can with an <reading>auto</reading>  <reading>tossi</reading>ng (おととし) feature. What amazing technology!
